p: In the district court of the fourth judicial district of Washington Territory holding territory of Spokane Falls
Territory of Washington vs. Ray Raymond
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss

I J.F. Paul being by me first duly sworn deposes and says that he had carefully examined the list of persons filed in the auditors official list of qualified to act as Grand Jurors and that he has known of all fifty seven above successors & other person who are residents of Spokane County Washington Territory who are house holders and elect qualified electors and qualified grand jurors who are not on that hit.
Subscribed & sworn before me this the 23rd day of May 1887
